subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The ever-changing Western Athletic Conference is adding Chicago State in July, meaning the league will keep its automatic berths in the N.C.A.A. men’s and women’s tournaments next season.
snippet: The ever-changing Western Athletic Conference is adding Chicago State in July, meaning the league will keep its automatic berths in the N.C.A.A. men’s and women’s tournaments next season.
